sentences.sContent: We have to water this cactus once a month.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have to water this cactus once a month.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须每月给仙人掌浇一次水。

sentences.sContent: Grass people not to lie, as Gaizhong cactus!
sentences.sContent_eng: Grass people not to lie, as Gaizhong cactus!
sentences.sCn: 种草不让人去躺，不如改种仙人掌！

sentences.sContent: The road winds for miles through parched earth, scrub and cactus.
sentences.sContent_eng: The road winds for miles through parched earth, scrub and cactus.
sentences.sCn: 公路蜿蜒数英里，穿过炙烤的大地、灌木丛和仙人掌。

trans.tranOther: a desert plant with sharp points instead of leaves
